name: Bishi Bashi Special
description:
Bishi Bashi Special is a compilation of the two Konami games Super Bishi Bashi and Hyper Bishi, which were originally released only in Japan.

This game is made up of 85 mini-games that are meant to be played against each other. Some of the games feature such things as body builders on pogo sticks jumping for a piece of meat, a dance-off to get the biggest afro, a bride throwing wedding cake down the aisle, juggling cavemen eating different colored balls, to name just a few.

The game can be played in single player mode or against up to 8 others. It's totally random who each player faces in each round of party play, and the game only allows for 3 controllers at the same time, so players have to be quick passing them to the current players.
developedBy: Konami Computer Entertainment Sapporo Co., Ltd
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View
gamePlay: Arcade, Board game, Music / rhythm, Puzzle elements

releases.developer: Konami Computer Entertainment Sapporo Co., Ltd

shot.caption: Pick any of the two games.
Super Bishi Bashi title screen
SBB: playing alone or together with someone?
SBB: select game mode. Marathon has you playing all the games in a row, so you'll be playing for a while!
SBB: type in letters before the time runs out! (Yes, this is one of the mini-games.)
SBB: bash all the buttons to shake the soda can, and make the car go faster down the track.
SBB: car bowling in an opera house.
SBB: collect stars with the car by tilting the screen.
SBB: avoid all the cars to get to the goal in time.
SBB: just another day, walking to the office...
SBB: identify what flew by behind the building. Could it have been a green haired naked lady in a bathtub?
SBB: left & right jumping girl. The title of the mini-game says it all.
SBB: stay with the monkey phonics rhythm to eat the fruits.
SBB: shoot the bad guys by pressing the corresponding button on the controller.
Hyper Bishi Bashi title screen
HBB: select how many people will be playing.
HBB: select game mode.
HBB: some of the many mini-games you can play.
HBB: climb the ladders to get to the golden restroom!
HBB: eat more colored balls than your fellow caveman to the right to win.
HBB: play this magic oven slot machine to create food.
HBB: eat all the food that gets shoved towards you.
HBB: Pong-like game with random objects that bounce around. In this round it's a Twinbee.
HBB: when the rods shake, pull up the fish before your opponent.
